homeSliderData.title: Feels Good to Be Fiery
homeSliderData.description: Our Sweet + Spicy Chicken Pita is back for a limited time!

homeSliderData.title: Sweet, fiery satisfaction
homeSliderData.description: New Spicy Falafel lights up every forkful with fire-roasted jalapeños, harissa + fresh herbs.

homeSliderData.title: DOUSE ON EVERYTHING, REGRET NOTHING
homeSliderData.description: Make every bite mouthwatering with sweet-tart Balsamic Date Vinaigrette.

sliderData.title: BALSAMIC DATE CHICKEN
sliderData.description: Get cozy with grilled chicken, eggplant dip, red pepper hummus, fire-roasted corn, balsamic date vinaigrette, and more.

sliderData.title: Sweet + Spicy Chicken Pita
sliderData.description: Go bold with harissa honey chicken paired with balsamic date vinaigrette. Plus fresh tzatziki, tomato + onion, pickles, romaine.

sliderData.title: Market Spice Bowl
sliderData.description: Dig into mouthwatering layers of spicy falafel, fiery broccoli, pickled onions, hummus, skhug, garlic dressing, rice, and more.

PITA.description: Harissa honey chicken meets balsamic date vinaigrette. Plus, tzatziki, tomato + onion, pickles, romaine.

PITA.description: Falafel, hummus, roasted eggplant, pickles, cabbage slaw, tomato + onion, garlic dressing, skhug.

PITA.title: GREEK CHICKEN
PITA.description: Grilled chicken, hummus, tzatziki, pickles, tomato + onion, olives, feta, shredded romaine, Greek Vinaigrette.

PITA.title: PITA
PITA.description: Fill our fluffy and perfectly chewy pita with your unique combo of ingredients. Made with sprouted grains.

DRINK.title: PINEAPPLE APPLE MINT
DRINK.description: This super refreshing juice is made in-house with pineapple, apple cider, fresh mint, and lime juice.

DRINK.title: BLUEBERRY LAVENDER
DRINK.description: Made in-house from a purée of blueberries and lavender.

DRINK.title: CUCUMBER MINT LIME
DRINK.description: A cure to any midday slump. Sweet and refreshing, balanced out with fresh lime juice. Made in-house.

DRINK.title: SPINDRIFT LEMON
DRINK.description: Sparkling lemon water that tastes like the real thing—because it is! There's real lemon juice in each can.

KIDMENU.title: KID'S MILK
KIDMENU.description: A mini version of our build-your-own pita with a side of pita chips or carrots sticks. Choose milk or juice.
